title: 34p Land in Colpetty
details:
34 Perch Land. Suitable for build apartment.
Currently monthly income generating.
Access from two Roads.
Around 70 feet road frontage from one side. other road side around 60 feet road frontage
Sea side
2nd block from the Galle Road.
Colpetty junction very near.
20 feet wide road.
Good investment.
500 million (Land value only)
